104b4(khri brgyad): gzhag pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhagad pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
104b5(khri brgyad): rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye ragazhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid lags
104b6(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi
104b7(khri brgyad): bgyi'o// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / 
104b8(khri brgyad): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
105a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
105a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
105a3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas
105a4(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams lag das pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ 
105a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre/ sa pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan
105a6(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
105a7(khri brgyad): phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/ 
105a8(khri brgyad): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
105b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
105b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i kyi / bcom ldan 'dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
105b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa ma lags la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
105b4(khri brgyad): pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas shes rab kyi pha rol
105b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzha na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la
105b6(khri brgyad): gnas par mi bgyi'o// yi ge mngon par sgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// gcig brjod pa dang / gnyis brjod pa dang / tha dad pa brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
105b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yi ge rnams ni yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yi ge rnams ma lags la/ yi ge rnams las gud na yang
105b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yi ge rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
106a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi
106a3(khri brgyad): rtag ge zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa ni gzugs mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
106a4(khri brgyad): gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa
106a5(khri brgyad): nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs mi
106a6(khri brgyad): rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de
106a7(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa mi rtagapa ni rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags
106a8(khri brgyad): la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam
106b1(khri brgyad): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / 
106b2(khri brgyad): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
106b3(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
106b4(khri brgyad): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i dben pa ni rnam par shes pa'i dben pas sto ste/ rnam par shes pa'i dben pa nyid gang lags pa de/ 
106b5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang dben pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par / sa pa nyid kyang dben pa nyid lags/ dben pa nyid kyang rnam
106b6(khri brgyad): bar shes pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa dben zhes
106b7(khri brgyad): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i
106b8(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ de bzhin nyid ma lags la/ stong pa
107a1(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
107a2(khri brgyad): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings
107a3(khri brgyad): dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
107a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgos
107a5(khri brgyad): stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ gzungs kyi sgo ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo ma mchis te/ 
107a6(khri brgyad): gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she
107a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
107a8(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ 
107b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi
107b2(khri brgyad): ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab
107b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes
107b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
107b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzungs kyi
107b6(khri brgyad): sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang
107b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
107b8(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// 
108a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / 
108a2(khri brgyad): yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / 
108a3(khri brgyad): chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
108a4(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da la bsgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
108a5(khri brgyad): yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma
108a6(khri brgyad): gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su gzungs pa ma mchis/ tshor ba
108a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags
108a8(khri brgyad): pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ gzugs ma lags shing tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags
108b1(khri brgyad): pa de/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lagaso// yang dag pa'i
108b2(khri brgyad): mtha'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i slad du'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang
108b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ 
108b4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi ste// ci nas chos gang la yang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur pa de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan
108b5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yod sa su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba phul du byung ba/ 
108b6(khri brgyad): tshad ma mchis pa nges pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
108b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
108b8(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
109a1(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / 
109a2(khri brgyad): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma
109a3(khri brgyad): mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// mtshan ma gang lags zhe na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma
109a4(khri brgyad): lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so// / mig ni mtshan ma lag so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
109a5(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma lags so// gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// mig gi rnam
109a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni
109a7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma lags so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / 
109a8(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lagaso// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
109b1(khri brgyad): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan sa
109b2(khri brgyad): lags so// sa'i khams ni mtshan ma lagaso// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma
109b3(khri brgyad): lags so// ma rig pa ni mtshan ma lags so// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / 
109b4(khri brgyad): len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dedag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
109b5(khri brgyad): dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / 
109b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 
109b7(khri brgyad): chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags
109b8(khri brgyad): so/ gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so// tha dad pa brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so// mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lag so// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni maN+Da
110a1(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs
110a2(khri brgyad): bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur lags so// dad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos
110a3(khri brgyad): pa dang / brten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste/ de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags so// de ltar de ni mtshan ma
110a4(khri brgyad): dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / gzung ba ma mchis paragazung bar bgyi ba lags te/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad par rje su
110a5(khri brgyad): 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas/ gzugs yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
110a6(khri brgyad): pa yongs su ma bzung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar/ 
110a7(khri brgyad): des shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags
110a8(khri brgyad): par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des
110b1(khri brgyad): gang gis rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang / gang rtogs par bgyid pa'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang
110b2(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol
110b3(khri brgyad): tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs
110b4(khri brgyad): kyi nang dang / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang dang / phyi rol tu yang
110b5(khri brgyad): dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
110b6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de bzhin du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa
110b7(khri brgyad): de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// rnam grang
110b8(khri brgyad): 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
111a1(khri brgyad): kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du chos gang yang yongs su bzung ba ma mchis
111a2(khri brgyad): lags so// chos thams cad bzung du ma mchis pa dang / btang du ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang yongs su bgyi ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams
111a3(khri brgyad): cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang
111a4(khri brgyad): gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchi
111a5(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni/ gzhan gyi pha rol tu ma mchis pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
111a6(khri brgyad): lags so// de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' lags
111a7(khri brgyad): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon lam de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so
111a8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags
111b1(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan
111b2(khri brgyad): gyis pha rol tu mchi bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// / 
111b3(khri brgyad): bam po bdun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ 
111b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
111b5(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// de de ltar yongs su rtog cing de ltar nges par sems pa tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa
111b6(khri brgyad): gang lags pade/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de legs par mthong ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchi/ 
111b7(khri brgyad): shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing mi dmigs pa
111b8(khri brgyad): yin rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
112a1(khri brgyad): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
112a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
112a3(khri brgyad): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi
112a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi
112a5(khri brgyad): dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi
112a6(khri brgyad): dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba
112a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// mngon par
112a8(khri brgyad): pa med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA
112b1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rgyun
112b2(khri brgyad): tu zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang med cing mi
112b3(khri brgyad): dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad
112b4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi
112b5(khri brgyad): zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// 
112b6(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
112b7(khri brgyad): nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
112b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni
113a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral/ 
113a2(khri brgyad): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
113a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
113a4(khri brgyad): brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang debazhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
113a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan
113a6(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 
113a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang
113a8(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par
113b1(khri brgyad): shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni
113b2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i
113b3(khri brgyad): bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA
113b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di de la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
113b5(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ cha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa
113b6(khri brgyad): 'di la slob pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing 'byung ba
113b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
113b8(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni
114a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye
114a2(khri brgyad): ba dang / nges par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
114a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yino// de ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag
114a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / 
114a5(khri brgyad): sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa tho ba par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang / ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti
114a6(khri brgyad): mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed
114a7(khri brgyad): do/ de 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed pas/ 
114a8(khri brgyad): nam yang ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing / rtag par rgyun tu brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o// de sems
114b1(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su smin par byed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
114b2(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
114b3(khri brgyad): po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
114b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las
114b5(khri brgyad): kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol/ 
114b6(khri brgyad): to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ 
114b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi
114b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi ba'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma
115a1(khri brgyad): lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
115a2(khri brgyad): spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te
115a3(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal gzugs la bdag
115a4(khri brgyad): ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
115a5(khri brgyad): pa la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shesabagyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags// gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes
115a6(khri brgyad): bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
115a7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
115a8(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags
115b1(khri brgyad): so bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
115b2(khri brgyad): la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / 
115b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
115b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na/ dmigs
115b5(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
115b6(khri brgyad): chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma
115b7(khri brgyad): nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
115b8(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir/ 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
116a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
116a2(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing / kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
116a3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
116a4(khri brgyad): dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
116a5(khri brgyad): pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos
116a6(khri brgyad): gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu
116a7(khri brgyad): shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la
116a8(khri brgyad): gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
116b1(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang
116b2(khri brgyad): ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde
116b3(khri brgyad): ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
116b4(khri brgyad): gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam
116b5(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas
116b6(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
116b7(khri brgyad): la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
116b8(khri brgyad): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi thar zhing / sdug bsngal la sogs pa las yongs su mi 'grol lo// 
117a1(khri brgyad): zhes kho ba snga'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' di ni nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i skal pa yang med na/ 
117a2(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
117a3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
117a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe// gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi
117a6(khri brgyad): spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de
117a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi
117a8(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
117b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / 
117b2(khri brgyad): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
117b3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
117b4(khri brgyad): mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tsher ba dang / 'dushes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
117b5(khri brgyad): shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
117b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma
117b7(khri brgyad): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / 
117b8(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa
118a1(khri brgyad): med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa
118a2(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
118a3(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par
118a4(khri brgyad): rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam das kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni/ sangs dargyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na
118a5(khri brgyad): yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin la/ sangs
118a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs la mtha/ 
118a7(khri brgyad): par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
118a8(khri brgyad): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal pa yod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig mkhas len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
118b1(khri brgyad): spyod mas no// khang mi nan sang / shes bkyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sa yin no// khas le kyang sem la khas mi me ma len na yang shes rabakyi rol tu byan
118b2(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len pa yang ma yin khas mi len pa yang ma yin na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par
118b3(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ci'i phyir/ khas mi len/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
118b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmig/ sa pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang lda nu pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos
118b5(khri brgyad): po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ spyod do zhes bya bar khasas
118b6(khri brgyad): len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do ces bya bar khas mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar khas mi len
118b7(khri brgyad): to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
118b8(khri brgyad): bo de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ gnyis su med
119a1(khri brgyad): cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul
119a2(khri brgyad): du bya ba/ tshad med pa nges pa mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
119a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas
119a4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon parardzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan
119a5(khri brgyad): ngag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gi sa gnas pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
119a6(khri brgyad): po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas byang
119a7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
119a8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
119b1(khri brgyad): chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par
119b2(khri brgyad): rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags
119b3(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa
119b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal man tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje da rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
119b5(khri brgyad): cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyal po ltar shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu
119b6(khri brgyad): 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
119b7(khri brgyad): rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
119b8(khri brgyad): nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i
120a1(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes
120a2(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan
120a3(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
120a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med
120a5(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma
120a6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa
120a7(khri brgyad): dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
120a8(khri brgyad): zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
120b1(khri brgyad): mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
120b2(khri brgyad): shes rabaskon ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye sa
120b3(khri brgyad): tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas
120b4(khri brgyad): bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag tu bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam
120b5(khri brgyad): nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par
120b6(khri brgyad): mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba/ 
120b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
120b8(khri brgyad): ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya
121a1(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su
121a2(khri brgyad): gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
121a3(khri brgyad): yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes
121a4(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
121a5(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa cig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting
121a6(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa
121a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya/ 
121a8(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams
121b1(khri brgyad): cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang
121b2(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa
121b3(khri brgyad): dang 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
121b4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes
121b5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
121b6(khri brgyad): dang sgra med pa dang / sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
121b7(khri brgyad): gnas la rten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba
121b8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas na mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa
122a1(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
122a2(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i
122a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa'
122a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo
122a5(khri brgyad): tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byoragyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
122a6(khri brgyad): bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
122a7(khri brgyad): kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
122a8(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang
122b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / bdag ni
122b2(khri brgyad): snyoms par zhugs so// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba des/ ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med de/ byang chub
122b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang
122b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegadas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis
122b5(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang
122b6(khri brgyad): gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i
122b7(khri brgyad): phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
122b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
123a1(khri brgyad): yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bus spras
123a2(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
123a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar
123a4(khri brgyad): rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir de ltar ting nge 'jin de dag la rnam par rtog pa mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa
123a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin de dag rnam par mi shes shing kun tu shes so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
123a6(khri brgyad): 'byor ci'i phyir na des rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
123a7(khri brgyad): de med pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par mi shes shing / kun tu mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar
123a8(khri brgyad): ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod kyis bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so legs so// rab 'byor// 
123b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
123b2(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
123b3(khri brgyad): chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la yang de ltar bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
123b4(khri brgyad): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam
123b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin
123b6(khri brgyad): te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
123b7(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ste/ de yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
123b8(khri brgyad): bo de dag la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// 
124a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dras pa rnams kyi bar la slab ste/ da yang ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slab pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang / 
124a2(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
124a3(khri brgyad): slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
124a4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lag das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
124a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so// shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung
124a6(khri brgyad): po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag
124a7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs
124a8(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
124b1(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
124b2(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas
124b3(khri brgyad): kyi bar du mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad kyi
124b4(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med
124b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dgapa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
124b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos gang dag slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang mi slob
124b7(khri brgyad): po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
124b8(khri brgyad): 'das chos 'di dag ji ltar bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i
125a1(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
125a2(khri brgyad): ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ tshor ba dang / 
125a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ khams dang / skye mched
125a4(khri brgyad): dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir
125a5(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
125a6(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yod pa ma yin no/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang / sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la
125a7(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen nas/ 'di lta ste rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis chags pas na/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su
125a8(khri brgyad): brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la yang ma
125b1(khri brgyad): par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas na yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir de dag mi shes mi mthong ba yin no// ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs
125b2(khri brgyad): mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par
125b3(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas/ de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grang
125b4(khri brgyad): su 'gro ba yin no// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// 
125b5(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin/ no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
125b6(khri brgyad): las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni ma dad pa yin te/ ci zhig la ma dad ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar ma dad pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes
125b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i bar dag la ma dad pa yin no// de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas pa zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
125b8(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// phyir mi ldog pa'i
126a1(khri brgyad): sa la mi gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te// 
126a2(khri brgyad): ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin
126a3(khri brgyad): no/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin// s+tha dang / 
126a4(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// 'dod
126a5(khri brgyad): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// byang chub kyi bar dag la
126a6(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
126a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
126a8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma
126b1(khri brgyad): yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa
126b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/ 
126b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
126b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed/ sangs
126b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la brtag
126b6(khri brgyad): nas mngon par zhen par byed de/ shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa
126b7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
126b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar
127a1(khri brgyad): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges
127a2(khri brgyad): par mi 'byung ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing
127a3(khri brgyad): ji ltar bslabs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
127a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems/ 
127a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo // 
127a6(khri brgyad): bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i
127a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub kyi bar dag mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 
127a8(khri brgyad): thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub
127b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
127b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
127b3(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
127b4(khri brgyad): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
127b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji
127b6(khri brgyad): skad bstan par bgyi/ de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrim
127b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
127b8(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
128a1(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslab nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
128a2(khri brgyad): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod
128a3(khri brgyad): pa de ltar lan thob shig/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la/ tshor ba dang
128a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
128a5(khri brgyad): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang / gzhan la mig kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu
128a6(khri brgyad): ma yang gzhan la rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
128a7(khri brgyad): sgyu ma yang gzhan la sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam
128a8(khri brgyad): 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par
128b1(khri brgyad): shes pa sang gzhan nag yan sum 'am/ rgyum yang gzhanas mig gi 'dus te rig pa yang gzhan nag yin snyam pa/ sgyum yang gzham pan pa'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i
128b2(khri brgyad): tshig pa dang / sde'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan zhig yin gyim 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
128b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba bde ba'am/ 
128b4(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
128b5(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / rtswa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyim tshor ba dang / 
128b6(khri brgyad): yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan nig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
128b7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu/ 
128b8(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam/ 
129a1(khri brgyad): du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
129a2(khri brgyad): sgyu ma yang gzhan la smon pa med pa yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
129a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
129a4(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
129a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan// la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan zhigayin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
129a6(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang
129a7(khri brgyad): gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
129a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig kyang gzhan ma
129b1(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
129b2(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sgyu ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
129b3(khri brgyad): gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ 
129b4(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
129b5(khri brgyad): ches rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma/ yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi
129b6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
129b7(khri brgyad): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam
129b8(khri brgyad): par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma
130a1(khri brgyad): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das/
