130a2(khri brgyad): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang
130a3(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ 
130a4(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags
130a5(khri brgyad): te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags
130a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags
130a7(khri brgyad): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
130a8(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba yang
130b1(khri brgyad): ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
130b2(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
130b3(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba yang ma lags/ bde ba yang ma lags pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang gzhan
130b4(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags
130b5(khri brgyad): so/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid
130b6(khri brgyad): kyang stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhon ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid kyang
130b7(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom
130b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs
131a1(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sku ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs
131a2(khri brgyad): ba'i stobs rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
131a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
131a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams
131a5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba
131a6(khri brgyad): yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye
131a7(khri brgyad): ba'am/ 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
131a8(khri brgyad): gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam
131b1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
131b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// le'u dgu pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
131b3(khri brgyad): pa khri brgyad stong pa// / bam po brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems nye bar
131b4(khri brgyad): len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming dang brdas tha snyad du gdag sa su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
131b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems ming dang brdas tha snyad gdags pa tsam
131b6(khri brgyad): gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
131b7(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la ming dang mtshan ma med pa dang / brda med pa dang / gdags pa med
131b8(khri brgyad): ba tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid
132a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi
132a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
132a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
132a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung b.ra'agyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
132a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob cing / bla na med pa
132a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslabs par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
132a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sem
132a8(khri brgyad): phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
132b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i
132b2(khri brgyad): rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi
132b3(khri brgyad): lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
132b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de ni mi 'byung lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchi rngas pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i
132b5(khri brgyad): rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byora'adi ji snyam du sems/ brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po
132b6(khri brgyad): ngag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
132b7(khri brgyad): pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i
132b8(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ 
133a1(khri brgyad): sgyu ma yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
133a2(khri brgyad): gzugs brnyan yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de yang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
133a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de
133a4(khri brgyad): ni dbang po drug lags shing / de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la/ de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
133a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg
133a6(khri brgyad): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag te dngang zhing dang bar mi lag grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te
133a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yang yin la/ thabs la yang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis lag tu yang ma
133a8(khri brgyad): song na/ skrag cing dngangal dngang bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas
133b1(khri brgyad): bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
133b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de yang
133b3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag
133b4(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
133b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni
133b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam
133b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste de la yang mi dmigaso// 
133b8(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / 
134a1(khri brgyad): bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par
134a2(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134a3(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
134a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzug sa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
134a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs
134a6(khri brgyad): so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
134a7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog
134a8(khri brgyad): ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// 
134b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog
134b2(khri brgyad): skye/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs
134b3(khri brgyad): so rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ 
134b4(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs so// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// ra
134b5(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
134b6(khri brgyad): bas/ gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor
134b7(khri brgyad): rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
134b8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 
135a1(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mngon par 'dra/ 
135a2(khri brgyad): bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so
135a3(khri brgyad): sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
135a4(khri brgyad): par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste de yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
135a5(khri brgyad): pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can
135a6(khri brgyad): thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi
135a7(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
135a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i
135b1(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
135b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i
135b3(khri brgyad): tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag
135b4(khri brgyad): mi dang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la
135b5(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i
135b6(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// 
135b7(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rnam par she
135b8(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes
136a1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs
136a2(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
136a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes
136a4(khri brgyad): ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub
136a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dang zhing dang
136a6(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal
136a7(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
136a8(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing / bzod pa la 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub
136b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam
136b2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes
136b3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces
136b4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bdang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 
136b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhe/ sa bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya
136b6(khri brgyad): ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog cing / de yang mi
136b7(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing / brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
136b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dang zhing dang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
137a1(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan
137a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / de las gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha
137a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
137a4(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong
137a5(khri brgyad): pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
137a6(khri brgyad): shes pa stong pa nyid yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong
137a7(khri brgyad): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
137a8(khri brgyad): nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / 
137b1(khri brgyad): chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes
137b2(khri brgyad): pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
137b3(khri brgyad): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong
137b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig/ gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
137b5(khri brgyad): kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te/ reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
137b6(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te/ 
137b7(khri brgyad): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
137b8(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
138a1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
138a2(khri brgyad): gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
138a3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// 
138a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa da rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyi
138a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi/ lam nyid kyi nga stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
138a6(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi
138a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
138a8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ thabs de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dang zhing dang bar mi
138b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi
138b2(khri brgyad): skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
138b3(khri brgyad): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
138b4(khri brgyad): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de
138b5(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byedarnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya b.rachos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
138b6(khri brgyad): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
138b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
138b8(khri brgyad): ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / 
139a1(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
139a2(khri brgyad): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug
139a3(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
139a4(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
139a5(khri brgyad): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
139a6(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug
139a7(khri brgyad): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du
139a8(khri brgyad): bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
139b1(khri brgyad): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya
139b2(khri brgyad): ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / 
139b3(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
139b4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dgani byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
139b5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag/ ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
139b6(khri brgyad): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba/ 
139b7(khri brgyad): ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
139b8(khri brgyad): su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / 
140a1(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ 
140a2(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ 
140a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
140a4(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshorapa mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / 
140a5(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos ston to// 
140a6(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
140a7(khri brgyad): mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang / 
140a8(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston/ sdug bsngal zhes
140b1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston/ 
140b2(khri brgyad): te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
140b3(khri brgyad): su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
140b4(khri brgyad): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i
140b5(khri brgyad): rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag
140b6(khri brgyad): par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i
140b7(khri brgyad): tshul gyis ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi
140b8(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de yang mi dmigs
141a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu/ 
141a2(khri brgyad): mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongs su zin pa ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi
141a3(khri brgyad): skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
141a4(khri brgyad): pa thabs la mi mkhas pas sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
141a5(khri brgyad): bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dang bzhing dang bar 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
141a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs
141a7(khri brgyad): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
141a8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / 
141b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bral bas/ 
141b2(khri brgyad): gzugapa dang stong ba zhes bya bar yang la byed/ gzugs kyi snang ba zhes bya bar ying la byed/ gzugs phyin stong ba zhes bya bar med la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ba nyid
141b3(khri brgyad): du ma / du shes / du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa na stong banas ba mang mi byed/ rnam pa shes pa
141b4(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar yang la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi na sto/ ba zhes pa byar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i nga bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid
141b5(khri brgyad): la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs phyi stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong / pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
141b6(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang mi dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
141b7(khri brgyad): mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
141b8(khri brgyad): rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang
142a1(khri brgyad): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs/ 
142a2(khri brgyad): nga'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la yang bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par
142a3(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
142a4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang
142a5(khri brgyad): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la
142a6(khri brgyad): byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
142a7(khri brgyad): la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ 
142a8(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams
142b1(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang / bral bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag/ 
142b2(khri brgyad): gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
142b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
142b4(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang sgom zhing / de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
142b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dang
142b6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs
142b7(khri brgyad): bo des yongs su zin pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
142b8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis
143a1(khri brgyad): 'di la bslab par mi bya'o// 'di dag ni snyan ngags mkhan gyis rang bzo yin pas/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// 
143a2(khri brgyad): kun chub par mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// bklag par mi bya'o// sgom par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o zhes/ shes
143a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
143a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
143a5(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur
143a6(khri brgyad): cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas/ khyod la ci zhig bya/ 
143a7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha
143a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pas khyod la tso zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed de/ de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing / bdud
143b1(khri brgyad): nyes pa dag mi brjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
143b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 
143b3(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'i
143b4(khri brgyad): sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed// gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed
143b5(khri brgyad): cing / bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pa gang yin paste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
143b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsdus
143b7(khri brgyad): cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do// khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma
143b8(khri brgyad): yin no// khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang
144a1(khri brgyad): yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig
144a2(khri brgyad): can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / 
144a3(khri brgyad): sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams na
144a4(khri brgyad): bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam parashes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i
144a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis
144a6(khri brgyad): stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // 
144a7(khri brgyad): mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
144a8(khri brgyad): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha
144b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
144b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
144b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na
144b4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci zhig bya zhes zer ro zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa
144b5(khri brgyad): ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
144b6(khri brgyad): chu byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub
144b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhin du phyogs bcu
144b8(khri brgyad): kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa'
145a1(khri brgyad): yang med/ nyan thos kyang med de zhes zer mo zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
145a2(khri brgyad): pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa/ 
145a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag bzlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te rjes su sten par byed do zhes bdud kyi lnga
145a4(khri brgyad): de lta bu dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
145a5(khri brgyad): gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad/ du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
145a6(khri brgyad): spyod pa dang bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bar byed cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phag
145a7(khri brgyad): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la yang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du rigs
145a8(khri brgyad): kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta
145b1(khri brgyad): bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can pha dang
145b2(khri brgyad): ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du skal pa tshad med grang med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa
145b3(khri brgyad): bcad pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / mgo bcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
145b4(khri brgyad): pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar
145b5(khri brgyad): yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
145b6(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ mig mi rtag ces
145b7(khri brgyad): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / 
145b8(khri brgyad): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
146a1(khri brgyad): yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
146a2(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar
146a3(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / 
146a4(khri brgyad): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
146a5(khri brgyad): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / 
146a6(khri brgyad): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / 
146a7(khri brgyad): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
146a8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i
146b1(khri brgyad): tshul gyis ston pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang
146b2(khri brgyad): yongs su spang bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
146b3(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol
146b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i
146b5(khri brgyad): don to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang / skye ba med/ sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba dang / yod pa
146b6(khri brgyad): nyid med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub la yang gzhi med/ sems dpa' la yang bzhi med/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// 
146b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
146b8(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
147a1(khri brgyad): sgyu ma lagazhi med cing mi dmigs so// smig rgyu dang / chu b+hU dang / drag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
147a2(khri brgyad): sprul pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs
147a3(khri brgyad): so/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmig so// gzhan ma
147a4(khri brgyad): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing
147a5(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig/ sa so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
147a6(khri brgyad): bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
147a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu
147a8(khri brgyad): la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lho dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / 
147b1(khri brgyad): ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
147b2(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes
147b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de
147b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub semasas dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab
147b5(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmi/ gas so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

147b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
147b8(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi
148a1(khri brgyad): dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
148a2(khri brgyad): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems

148a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor
148b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/

148b4(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi
148b5(khri brgyad): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// 
148b6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la yang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor
148b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med
148b8(khri brgyad): pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor
149a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'thung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mong

151a1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

151a6(khri brgyad): gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /

151b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ spyod pa med pa/ 
151b2(khri brgyad): bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa dang / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
151b3(khri brgyad): kyi mtshan nyid med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
151b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par
151b5(khri brgyad): bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
151b6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
151b7(khri brgyad): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / 
151b8(khri brgyad): thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag ni med pa nyid la bslab par
152a1(khri brgyad): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba yang de dag yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri
152a2(khri brgyad): brgyad stong pa// / bam po dgu pa// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams
152a3(khri brgyad): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni phar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa 'am/ 
152a4(khri brgyad): bram zer 'dzin pa 'am/ rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gror byed da pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i gsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / 
152a5(khri brgyad): bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
152a6(khri brgyad): dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / 
152a7(khri brgyad): rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes
152a8(khri brgyad): dang 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / 
152b1(khri brgyad): chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba
152b2(khri brgyad): rjes su dran pa dang / rngub pa rjesu dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten
152b3(khri brgyad): pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
152b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod dpas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 
152b5(khri brgyad): phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / logapar lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 
152b6(khri brgyad): 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams shes bya'o// 
152b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 
152b8(khri brgyad): ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched
153a1(khri brgyad): drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
153a2(khri brgyad): drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig
153a3(khri brgyad): rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / 
153a4(khri brgyad): khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
153a5(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig/ rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i
153a6(khri brgyad): chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
153a7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / 
153a8(khri brgyad): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma
153b1(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / 
153b2(khri brgyad): rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par
153b3(khri brgyad): grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs
153b4(khri brgyad): rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// da nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzu dgas rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// 
153b5(khri brgyad): sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnam
153b6(khri brgyad): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa
153b7(khri brgyad): 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam
153b8(khri brgyad): shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci
154a1(khri brgyad): yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag
154a2(khri brgyad): par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes min skye
154a3(khri brgyad): mched la yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tsher ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar
154a4(khri brgyad): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtogs pa dang bcas pa
154a5(khri brgyad): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang
154a6(khri brgyad): yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' bo dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas
154a7(khri brgyad): pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang / shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de
154a8(khri brgyad): dran pa dang / dran pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba yang spangs/ snga nas
154b1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam
154b2(khri brgyad): gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi
154b3(khri brgyad): 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
154b4(khri brgyad): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa tham
154b5(khri brgyad): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag para'adas te/ ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du
154b6(khri brgyad): ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
154b7(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i
154b8(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
155a1(khri brgyad): rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phung po lnga dang / 
155a2(khri brgyad): skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni
155a3(khri brgyad): zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
155a4(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun da dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 
155a5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ 
155a6(khri brgyad): de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i
155a7(khri brgyad): khams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
155a8(khri brgyad): bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 
155b1(khri brgyad): gzhan du 'gyur bar mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
155b2(khri brgyad): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos
155b3(khri brgyad): rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
155b4(khri brgyad): shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 
155b5(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
155b6(khri brgyad): bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams
155b7(khri brgyad): cad la rtog pa med pa dang / dpyod pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams dang / chags pa med pa dang / yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o// chos
155b8(khri brgyad): thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
156a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems
156a2(khri brgyad): can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du byed par 'gyur bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
156a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul du bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ 
156a4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sem sa can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / 
156a5(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
156a6(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dag go// rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/ 
156a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen
156a8(khri brgyad): bo dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
156b1(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du
156b2(khri brgyad): bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag
156b3(khri brgyad): gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas
156b4(khri brgyad): pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres
156b5(khri brgyad): pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pas yongs su grub pa la bslabs par bya'o// chos
156b6(khri brgyad): rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag sgrub pas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab
156b7(khri brgyad): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang sems
156b8(khri brgyad): can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ 
157a1(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa
157a2(khri brgyad): de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ 
157a3(khri brgyad): bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur gyi bar du/ sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag
157a4(khri brgyad): khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus/ sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i
157a5(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla sa par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched// du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su
157a6(khri brgyad): myong bar bya'o// phyis gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
157a7(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub
157a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
157b1(khri brgyad): chen pos sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che ni gang / 
157b2(khri brgyad): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed/ 
157b3(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi bskyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi phul du
157b4(khri brgyad): phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su yang mi byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mi skul ba'i sems su bya'o// de la
157b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems
157b6(khri brgyad): su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bskul ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems
157b7(khri brgyad): can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang
157b8(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
158a1(khri brgyad): phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod
158a2(khri brgyad): pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
158a3(khri brgyad): pos rtag par rgyun tu chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la
158a4(khri brgyad): chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos
158a5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste// de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la
158a6(khri brgyad): kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa
158a7(khri brgyad): gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
158b1(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
158b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// 
158b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang
158b4(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po
158b5(khri brgyad): dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
158b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
158b7(khri brgyad): gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab
158b8(khri brgyad): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems
159a1(khri brgyad): can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi
159a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las khrel yod pa zhes bya ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
159a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan
