159a4(khri brgyad): 'dis kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba da la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol
159a5(khri brgyad): ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang
159a6(khri brgyad): zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / 
159a7(khri brgyad): tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / 
159a8(khri brgyad): phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / dben par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang chub kyi
159b1(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas
159b2(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / 
159b3(khri brgyad): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba dang / spang ba'i slad du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
159b4(khri brgyad): bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
159b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnamasadang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 
159b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
159b8(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ 
160a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
160a2(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs
160a3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
160a4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs pa lags/ so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor
160a5(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam pa med pa'i sem sa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i/ nyan thos dang / 
160a6(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
160a7(khri brgyad): bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems da ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen
160a8(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
160b1(khri brgyad): bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
160b2(khri brgyad): po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
160b3(khri brgyad): ri bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 
160b4(khri brgyad): 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
160b5(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gang skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang
160b6(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang
160b7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos
160b8(khri brgyad): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
161a1(khri brgyad): zag pa med par khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags
161a2(khri brgyad): pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
161a3(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// byang
161a4(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
161a5(khri brgyad): bar du yang chags pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras patshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de yang chags pa
161a6(khri brgyad): med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smra na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs
161a7(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu gtog/ 
161a8(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir
161b1(khri brgyad): zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zas/ 
161b2(khri brgyad): pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bung de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub
161b3(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos sa 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pa
161b4(khri brgyad): dag sa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ ra'abyor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA'i'i bu ji ska
161b5(khri brgyad): smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zagapa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// nyan
161b6(khri brgyad): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pas
161b7(khri brgyad): yin no// gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing yongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med kyi
161b8(khri brgyad): 'ongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// byang chu po phyogs kyis chos sum chu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa pani dang / mom yang dag par rig pa pazhi dang / 
162a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// shA ri
162a2(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa yang gzugs
162a3(khri brgyad): la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa yang 'du byed rnams
162a4(khri brgyad): la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// 
162a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam
162a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
162a7(khri brgyad): bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
162a8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
162b1(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
162b2(khri brgyad): 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
162b3(khri brgyad): sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ 
162b4(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las lta ba
162b5(khri brgyad): spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol
162b6(khri brgyad): to/ bcom ldan 'das don gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po
162b7(khri brgyad): khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
162b8(khri brgyad): lags/ sems can da ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// 
163a1(khri brgyad): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems
163a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi
163a3(khri brgyad): ched du byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa byin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin
163a4(khri brgyad): ba sbyin par byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te tshul khrims bsrung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi
163a5(khri brgyad): ched du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chul khrims bsrung ngo // nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 
163a6(khri brgyad): bzod pa bsgom pa ni ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi tshad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson
163a7(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// 
163a8(khri brgyad): nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
163b1(khri brgyad): spyod cing / bsam gtan rnams skyed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams/ 
163b2(khri brgyad): cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
163b3(khri brgyad): las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// zhe 'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la
163b4(khri brgyad): dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub de la dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag par go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems
163b5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du/ go chagron no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
163b6(khri brgyad): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
163b7(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
163b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA'i'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rangasas
164a1(khri brgyad): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i
164a2(khri brgyad): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba da ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
164a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
164a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo
164a5(khri brgyad): bde ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims// kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
164a6(khri brgyad): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa
164a7(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
164a8(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
164b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
164b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams
164b3(khri brgyad): kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// 
164b4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i
164b5(khri brgyad): 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
164b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa rgya e she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam
164b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
164b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165a1(khri brgyad): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin pa de yang sems can
165a2(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba da ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
165a3(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
165a4(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dod pa med na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165a5(khri brgyad): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
165a6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
165a7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
165a8(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ brtson 'grus mi mnyam mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
165b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rgyu dang ldan pa shApa'i bu gzhan spyang byung chub sems dpa' sems da rkyen
165b2(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
165b3(khri brgyad): sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ 
165b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
165b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi// pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
165b6(khri brgyad): dag gis chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su yang mi byed la mi dmigs
165b7(khri brgyad): ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
165b8(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i
166a1(khri brgyad): phyir go cha chen po zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 
166a2(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa
166a3(khri brgyad): bde yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i
166a4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
166a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga zha na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
166a6(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
166a7(khri brgyad): yid la bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
166a8(khri brgyad): thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
166b1(khri brgyad): pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te
166b2(khri brgyad): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin ning / dge
166b3(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba nga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
166b4(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
166b5(khri brgyad): bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
166b6(khri brgyad): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
166b7(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms zhing / de dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
166b8(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
167a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang / ra
167a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems
167a3(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam
167a4(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
167a5(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
167a6(khri brgyad): chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de yang nyan
167a7(khri brgyad): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems
167a8(khri brgyad): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
167b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gan
167b2(khri brgyad): te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ 'khor gsum
167b3(khri brgyad): yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
167b4(khri brgyad): bde ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
167b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis
167b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
167b7(khri brgyad): bsgom zhing de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / 
167b8(khri brgyad): sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
168a1(khri brgyad): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
168a2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
168a3(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
168a4(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag
168a5(khri brgyad): gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gis dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ 
168a6(khri brgyad): ro myang bar mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gis dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
168a7(khri brgyad): po'i thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gtan
168a8(khri brgyad): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong
168b1(khri brgyad): nas gnas kyang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed do// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas
168b2(khri brgyad): pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub
168b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes
168b4(khri brgyad): bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs
168b5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod cing / bsngags pa yang gsungs la/ ming yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra
168b6(khri brgyad): brjod pa yang mdzad la dbyangs rjes su sgrogs par yang mdzad do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168b7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha
168b8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i
169a1(khri brgyad): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa
169a2(khri brgyad): dang / bzhi pa rdzogs par bya ste gnas pa dang / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla
169a3(khri brgyad): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te/ 
169a4(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang da dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ 
169a5(khri brgyad): mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten ches kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
169a6(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te/ gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas/ 
169a7(khri brgyad): skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam
169a8(khri brgyad): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
169b1(khri brgyad): pa gang gi tshe/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par
169b2(khri brgyad): 'jug cing ldang ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// 
169b3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la gong ma bzhin
169b4(khri brgyad): du sbyar bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bsam gtan rnams dang
169b5(khri brgyad): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan de dag dang / 
169b6(khri brgyad): tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la ldang ba
169b7(khri brgyad): na/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa thams
169b8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bdag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do// 
170a1(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
170a2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen por gyur
170a3(khri brgyad): pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i
170a4(khri brgyad): khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te/ gnas shing phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab dpar byas te/ gnas pa dang / snying rje dang / ldan pa
170a5(khri brgyad): dang / dga' ba dang / ldan pa yang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems
170a6(khri brgyad): yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
170a7(khri brgyad): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge
170a8(khri brgyad): 'dzin ces bya'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon
170b1(khri brgyad): mongs pa gsal ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la yang brjod cing ston te/ rab tu
170b2(khri brgyad): 'tshal la rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed cing de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs nges par 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag nyid kyis/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i
170b4(khri brgyad): par dag gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag la yang gnas la/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sems sam/ 
170b5(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gis skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha
170b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
170b7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas/ yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 
170b8(khri brgyad): khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
171a1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
171a2(khri brgyad): cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
171a3(khri brgyad): po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / 
171a4(khri brgyad): rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'judag pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang
171a5(khri brgyad): mi ltung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cadadang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni
171a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
171a7(khri brgyad): bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug
171a8(khri brgyad): bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa so sor rtog pa de ni/ 
171b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
171b2(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
171b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
171b4(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
171b5(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ 
171b6(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhug pa yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po/ 
171b7(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab po zhes mngon par gzhol bar
171b8(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par/ 
172a1(khri brgyad): 'jug cing bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad grol bar bya'o zhes/ sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi
172a2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams
172a3(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / 
172a4(khri brgyad): mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing / ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
172a5(khri brgyad): su mi bsngo ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub
172a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi
172a7(khri brgyad): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
172a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
172b1(khri brgyad): pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
172b2(khri brgyad): tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa
172b3(khri brgyad): de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang / snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
172b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skyel de dag gis ro myang bar mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni/ byang chub
172b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi cha
172b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing
172b7(khri brgyad): ldang bar yang byed la/ de yang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan
172b8(khri brgyad): ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173a1(khri brgyad): chen po'i shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ 
173a2(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
173a3(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
173a4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag
173a5(khri brgyad): par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang chos thams cad la sems rnam
173a6(khri brgyad): bar g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
173a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thag pa chen po
173a8(khri brgyad): ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
173b1(khri brgyad): ni zhes bya ba dang / ma'i zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes byu dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod
173b2(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
173b3(khri brgyad): pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
173b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa yang mi 'jug
173b5(khri brgyad): la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa yang ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
173b6(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhug pa yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
173b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jugagazugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ 
173b8(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni
174a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
174a2(khri brgyad): dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug
174a3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig
174a4(khri brgyad): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa da dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 
174a5(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa yang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshulagyis de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
174a6(khri brgyad): po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
174a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg po lnga yang dag par
174a8(khri brgyad): gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha
174b1(khri brgyad): rab tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ des sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs te/ 
174b2(khri brgyad): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
174b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa yang de bzhin no// 
174b4(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
174b5(khri brgyad): gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang tshe/ mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa yang mi dmigs te/ 
174b6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// 
174b7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i
174b8(khri brgyad): phyir nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis/ bsgom pa
175a1(khri brgyad): rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa
175a2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175a3(khri brgyad): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres padag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/ 
175a4(khri brgyad): de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir stong pa
175a5(khri brgyad): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams
175a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
175a7(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems
175a8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmigs
175b1(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya deni pa snad tsam du bad par shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di sa ste gzugs shes bya/ 
175b2(khri brgyad): bde sang ming du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes
175b3(khri brgyad): bde ni ring madri ngo // mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du 'angad // yi dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya ba de ni
175b4(khri brgyad): ming tsam du zad do// khams rnams dang / mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtswa bdun
175b5(khri brgyad): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no// 
175b6(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po
175b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag/ 
175b8(khri brgyad): pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de
176a1(khri brgyad): ni ming tsam du zud do// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de ni ming
176a2(khri brgyad): tsam du zad de zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
176a3(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po/ 
176a4(khri brgyad): la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / sangs
176a5(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing nas gang la gang 'ong ba'i mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do// bla mar byed do// 
176a6(khri brgyad): ri mor byed do// mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de theg pa chen po de la zhon ste/ 
176a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
176a8(khri brgyad): 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/ lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed nus pa de lta bu'i lus
176b1(khri brgyad): bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ye shes thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des
176b2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / 
176b3(khri brgyad): na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// 
176b4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i
176b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ga ge/ mo zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
176b6(khri brgyad): chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po la zhon nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan par
176b7(khri brgyad): sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / 
176b8(khri brgyad): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa brjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhes bya ba
177a1(khri brgyad): zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thos
177a2(khri brgyad): nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes snyan par sgrogs shing dbyangs brjod pa mdzad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag
177a3(khri brgyad): par gnas pa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// 
177a4(khri brgyad): bam po bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos shes bgyin
177a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos she/ sa bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
177a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin
177a7(khri brgyad): du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
177a8(khri brgyad): byin pa'ig cha mgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha gos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa dang / dbang po dang / rlobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
177b1(khri brgyad): lam gyi go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos
177b2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'brel lo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos
177b3(khri brgyad): nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ 
177b4(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag da la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang
177b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod cing dbyangs sgrog go/ 
177b6(khri brgyad): nas sems can dmyal ba de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang / yid bde ba de thob ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas
177b7(khri brgyad): gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang / lha dang / mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// 
177b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der
178a1(khri brgyad): / de shA nga /  /  rdzog dang / nga/ brjod / su dang /  gyu / 
178a2(khri brgyad): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par byed cing / rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar
178a3(khri brgyad): rnams su ma rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par
178a4(khri brgyad): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i
178a5(khri brgyad): sgra brjod cing / dbyangs sgrog go// de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang
178a6(khri brgyad): yid bde ba de nyid kyis/ sems can dmyal ba de dag byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang / lha dang
178a7(khri brgyad): mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mnyes par byed do// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / 
178a8(khri brgyad): gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// rab
178b1(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa
178b2(khri brgyad): zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la/ des mngon par sprul
178b3(khri brgyad): nas/ sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi
178b4(khri brgyad): sgra des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'dzag rten nas byung bar gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du
178b5(khri brgyad): sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / 
178b6(khri brgyad): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas phyung ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
178b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su dkrol
178b8(khri brgyad): yang / sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid de nye bar bzung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di
179a1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
179a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ go cha chen po bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya'i rang
179a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul
179a4(khri brgyad): par byed do// des 'khor los bskur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnamasal ni zas sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du btung ba dang / 
179a5(khri brgyad): gos dang / bzhon pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
179a6(khri brgyad): byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / bgo ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang
179a7(khri brgyad): byi ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / mu tig dang rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do// de zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin zhing yo byad gang
179a8(khri brgyad): yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to// sems can de dag
179b1(khri brgyad): gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar
179b2(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ nam skye ba'i
179b3(khri brgyad): tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ 
179b4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan
179b5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod
179b6(khri brgyad): pa rnams la ni zas byin zhing mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos
179b7(khri brgyad): nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
179b8(khri brgyad): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su
180a1(khri brgyad): skyes te/ de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam gtan bzhipa
180a2(khri brgyad): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum du rtsa bdun la 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi
180a3(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed cing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
180a4(khri brgyad): yang nam yang chos bstan pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa
180a5(khri brgyad): zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i 'dun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po shig mngon par sprul nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / 
180a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can
180a7(khri brgyad): 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
180a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can grangs
180b1(khri brgyad): med tshad med pa dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las/ 
180b2(khri brgyad): kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos
180b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sem
180b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god par byed do// 
180b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor
180b6(khri brgyad): zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ gal te sems can thams cad kyis
180b7(khri brgyad): bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang / lag cha dang / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed par mi bya'o// 
180b8(khri brgyad): snyam du sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po
181a1(khri brgyad): tshe'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar zhing bkod na/ 
181a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis
181a3(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
181a4(khri brgyad): sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// 
181a5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin pa'i phyirate/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
181a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems
181a7(khri brgyad): can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/ 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181a8(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181b1(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang
181b2(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po
181b3(khri brgyad): che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de
181b4(khri brgyad): bkod na rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems
181b5(khri brgyad): kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis
181b6(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang sems
181b7(khri brgyad): kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bkod pa med do// 
181b8(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182a1(khri brgyad): chen po go cha chen po 'gos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
182a2(khri brgyad): la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub
182a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/ 
182a4(khri brgyad): 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng
182a5(khri brgyad): 'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi
182a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// 
182a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
182a8(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor/ skye bo phal po che'i mdun du
182b1(khri brgyad): skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
182b2(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa des sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing 'jud ngade bkod pa yod snyam
182b3(khri brgyad): 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
182b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha
182b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
182b6(khri brgyad): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 
182b7(khri brgyad): sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
182b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
183a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam
183a2(khri brgyad): par byang ba 'am/ tshur rol 'am/ pha rol mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ 
183a3(khri brgyad): des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ 
183a4(khri brgyad): sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi
183a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/ bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du semasasgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des
183a6(khri brgyad): sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan
183a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can
183a8(khri brgyad): 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab
183b1(khri brgyad): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa
183b2(khri brgyad): ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de ji ltar/ bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ 
183b3(khri brgyad): sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol
183b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
183b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed pa la/ 'di lta ste
183b6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
183b7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
183b8(khri brgyad): nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
184a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin
184a2(khri brgyad): du bcug cing 'dzud de 'god do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
184a3(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god
184a4(khri brgyad): la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
184a5(khri brgyad): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu
184a6(khri brgyad): ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin
184a7(khri brgyad): du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin
184a8(khri brgyad): du bcug cing bcud de bkod pa yod snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
184b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po dag gi sems can de dag
184b2(khri brgyad): thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ 
184b3(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di son pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po bgos po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
184b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po bgos pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs
184b5(khri brgyad): mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di
184b6(khri brgyad): snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
184b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni
184b8(khri brgyad): dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed
185a1(khri brgyad): cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
185a2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la
185a3(khri brgyad): dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par
185a4(khri brgyad): mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod
185a5(khri brgyad): par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
185a6(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan cig/ 
185a7(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis sems can tshad med
185a8(khri brgyad): grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi
185b1(khri brgyad): slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems
185b2(khri brgyad): can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
185b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par
