238b3(khri brgyad): thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong gi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes
238b4(khri brgyad): bya bas sgyid lug par mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya ste/ 'di ltar
238b5(khri brgyad): rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pas stong nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa
238b6(khri brgyad): nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar yang stong pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong gi
238b7(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid rtogs par bya'o// de la byang chub sems
238b8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
239a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems
239a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
239a3(khri brgyad): dpa' ma /  sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing snying rje ba yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste snying rje chen po thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
239a4(khri brgyad): pos ji ltar sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/  'di lta ste sems can gyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
239a5(khri brgyad): po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa med pa dang / dbri ba med pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems
239a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rtogs pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi// 
239a7(khri brgyad): skye bar bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par bzod pa ste/ de ni mi skye bar bzod pa'o// de la byang
239a8(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ gang ming dang gzugs mi skye bar shes pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
239b1(khri brgyad): po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang chos gnyis su kun tu spyod pa med pa nyid de/ de ni
239b2(khri brgyad): tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par gzhom pa gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la rtog pa med pa'o// de la byang chub
239b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
239b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa bzlog pa gang zhe na/ gang bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// de la byang chub
239b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de la byang chub
239b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dul ba gang zhe na/ gang khams gsum la mngon par dga' ba med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems
239b7(khri brgyad): zhi ba gang zhe na/ gang dbang po drug po dag nas rab tu mi 'phro ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes pa thogs pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan
239b8(khri brgyad): thob pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su chags pa la mi 'jug pa'i shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug la btang snyoms su 'jog pa'o// de la
240a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhing gang du 'dod par 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang / der lus
240a2(khri brgyad): ston pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi
240a3(khri brgyad): sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas su lta ba'i
240a4(khri brgyad): phyir mngon par shes pa gang dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o// de la
240a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lta ba gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mgo yos la/ sangs
240a6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na yang snang zhing / de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji
240a7(khri brgyad): ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sa la gnas nas/ sems can yongs su
240a8(khri brgyad): smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su yang mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
240b1(khri brgyad): la bsnyen bkur bya ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ gang chos la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
240b2(khri brgyad): po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
240b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o// de la byang
240b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba gang zhe na/ ming mi gas pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyisam so yong
240b5(khri brgyad): su dag par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyum lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
240b6(khri brgyad): po'i ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas/ bya ba thams cad byed la/ de'i sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyun mi 'chad
240b7(khri brgyad): par snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
240b8(khri brgyad): po ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus yongs su bsgrub ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji
241a1(khri brgyad): lta ji lta bur sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i lus bsam bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
241a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ji ltar bsams bzhin du srid pa nye bar len zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos smon lam jiH
241a3(khri brgyad): ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bur 'grub par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rtogs par byas
241a4(khri brgyad): pas/ smon lam ji lta ji lta bur 'debs pa de lta de lta bura'agrub par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
241a5(khri brgyad): dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i
241a6(khri brgyad): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spobs pa'i klung khong du chud pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so yang dag par rig
241a7(khri brgyad): ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'od la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che rabs thams cad du
241a8(khri brgyad): brdzus shing skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngal du 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs
241b1(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rigs chen po dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa
241b2(khri brgyad): yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po
241b3(khri brgyad): lta bu dag dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sAl chen po lta bu dag tu skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang / 
241b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs gang las sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byung ba
241b5(khri brgyad): gyur pa ste/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa yin no//  la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor
241b6(khri brgyad): phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams byang chub tu bkod nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor nyid dang ldan pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
241b7(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa grang zhe na/ skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams
241b8(khri brgyad): cad snang bas khyab par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// 
242a1(khri brgyad): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / khyim nas rab tu 'byung zhing / mngon par 'byung la sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag las
242a3(khri brgyad): nges par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

242a5(khri brgyad): yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin la/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab mdo dag gis phyogs
242a6(khri brgyad): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i bar dag tu snang bas khyab par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi bkod pa phun sum
242a7(khri brgyad): tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
242b1(khri brgyad): par phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu la gnas pa/ ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces byazhe na/ byang chub
242b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa
242b3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shA kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs

242b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la spyod pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
242b7(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la spyod pa ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la yang dag par 'da' zhing / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 
242b8(khri brgyad): bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub
243a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa dgu po 'di dag las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub
243a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu yin no// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// shes
243a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sa yongs su sbyang pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// // rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du
243a4(khri brgyad): theg pa de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba/ ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der gnas
243a5(khri brgyad): par 'gyur te/ de yang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / 
243a6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste// 
243a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la ni nges par 'byung ba'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba
243a8(khri brgyad): 'am/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid las nges
243b1(khri brgyad): pabar 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos nyid med pa'i chos rnams nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 
243b2(khri brgyad): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i
243b3(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
243b4(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang

243b6(khri brgyad): ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa
243b7(khri brgyad): nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes kyi stong pa
243b8(khri brgyad): nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par
244a1(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
244a2(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi stong pa nyid la

244b5(khri brgyad): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas

244b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / rab 'byor de bzhin du sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i
244b8(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
245a1(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis sbyong ba dang / 
245a2(khri brgyad): smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brag cha'i rang bzhin ni brag cha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mig yor gyi ring bzhin ni mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis
245a3(khri brgyad): steng pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
245a4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i
245a5(khri brgyad): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
245a6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
245a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims
245a8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
245b1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
245b2(khri brgyad): 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
245b3(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni shes
245b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyi ra ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnam sa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang
245b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med
245b6(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / dngos po
245b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 
245b8(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni
246a1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung
246a2(khri brgyad): bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
246a3(khri brgyad): ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag
246a4(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung
246a5(khri brgyad): bapar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnam sa dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
246a6(khri brgyad): dang / lam la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar lam gyi bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // 
246a7(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam ni lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i
246a8(khri brgyad): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
246b1(khri brgyad): brgyad la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung
246b2(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
246b3(khri brgyad): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de
246b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung b.ra'adod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
246b5(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa
246b6(khri brgyad): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang
246b7(khri brgyad): bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di
246b8(khri brgyad): ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong / byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni
247a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stongade bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir/ 
247a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
247a3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
247a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe
247a5(khri brgyad): na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams
247a6(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / 
247a7(khri brgyad): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
247a8(khri brgyad): nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa dang / de bzhin du lan cig
247b1(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
247b2(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni ming la nges par 'byung bar
247b3(khri brgyad): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa la nges par
247b4(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni khamasagasum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa
247b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltaragadags pa ni gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i
247b6(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med
247b7(khri brgyad): pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
247b8(khri brgyad): med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par
248a1(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'ang
248a2(khri brgyad): ltar mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar na/ theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / 
248a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ thag pa de ni bskyod du med pa yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad
248a4(khri brgyad): stong pa// bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod 'di skad du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur/ zhes zer ba ni/ theg pa de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur
248a5(khri brgyad): ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas
248a6(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de yang gnas pa yang ma
248a7(khri brgyad): yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa
248a8(khri brgyad): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin
248b1(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin zhing yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i
248b2(khri brgyad): phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang
248b3(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis stong pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 
248b4(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa che/ na po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
248b5(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ spong ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbying sa dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin// 
248b6(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi
248b7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings ni
248b8(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
249a1(khri brgyad): nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'dod chags dang / 
249a2(khri brgyad): bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar na mkha'i khams
249a3(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin ni/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni spong ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral
249a4(khri brgyad): ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbying / sa kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin
249a5(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni gan sa pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
249a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tsher ba'i stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes
249a7(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg
249a8(khri brgyad): pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin
249b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang / 
249b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid
249b3(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i
249b4(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 
249b5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa dang / yid kyi bar du yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni
249b6(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
249b7(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi
249b8(khri brgyad): bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa dang / chos rnams kyi bar ni chos rnams kyi
250a1(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
250a2(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
250a3(khri brgyad): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar
250a4(khri brgyad): du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes da pa'i stong pa nyid ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa
250a5(khri brgyad): nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong
250a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin
250a7(khri brgyad): du thag pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa
250a8(khri brgyad): yang ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni
250b1(khri brgyad): mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bar du/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
250b2(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid ni/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa ma yin/ mig na
250b3(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
250b4(khri brgyad): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa'am/ da mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas
250b5(khri brgyad): pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
250b6(khri brgyad): gyis tshor bas stong pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rabs stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
250b7(khri brgyad): dper na/ rmi lam ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
250b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma
251a1(khri brgyad): yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
251a2(khri brgyad): 'byor rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam gyi rang bzhin ni/ rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i
251a3(khri brgyad): phyir ro// sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir
251a4(khri brgyad): zhen/ 'di ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni/ sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni/ smig rgyu'i darang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / brag cha'i rang bzhin
251a5(khri brgyad): brag cha'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mig yor gyi rang bzhin ni/ mig yor gyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni/ 
251a6(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ 
251a7(khri brgyad): no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
251a8(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi
251b1(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
251b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
251b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
251b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du she
251b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nang stong pa nyid ni gnas ba yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab
251b6(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa
251b7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
251b8(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma
252a1(khri brgyad): yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dngos po med/ 
252a2(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
252a3(khri brgyad): ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
252a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
252a5(khri brgyad): rang bzhin ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du
252a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
252a7(khri brgyad): 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lam ni lam
252a8(khri brgyad): gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos
252b1(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma/ 
252b2(khri brgyad): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
252b3(khri brgyad): pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin
252b4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag da ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
252b5(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rang sangs
252b6(khri brgyad): rgyas ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de
252b7(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas
252b8(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin ni/ dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni// 
253a1(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa yang
253a2(khri brgyad): ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
253a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ 
253a4(khri brgyad): mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
253a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis
253a6(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du gnas pa yang ma yin mi
253a7(khri brgyad): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rang byang chub ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin no// mi gnas pa yang
253a8(khri brgyad): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du gnas
253b1(khri brgyad): ba'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa dang / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
253b2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi bar du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 
253b3(khri brgyad): rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa
253b4(khri brgyad): yang ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa
253b5(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / 
253b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni/ 
253b7(khri brgyad): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab
253b8(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ming ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
254a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ mtshan ma dang / brda' dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// 
254a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming gi rang bzhin ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma
254a3(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / mtshan ma'i rang bzhin dang / brda'i rang bzhin dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin dang / gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa'am/ mi gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro// 
254a4(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gi rang bzhin no/ ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / mtshan ma'i rang de bzhin ni/ mtshan ma'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / 
254a5(khri brgyad): brda'i rang bzhin ni/ brda'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin ni/ tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gyi/ sa stong pa dang / gdags pa'i rang bzhin ni/ 
254a6(khri brgyad): gdags pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa
254a7(khri brgyad): chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang
254a8(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa
254b1(khri brgyad): yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
254b2(khri brgyad): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye
254b3(khri brgyad): ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong po dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par
254b4(khri brgyad): 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'a byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de mi gnas par gnas pa'i
254b5(khri brgyad): tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor khyod 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes
254b6(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/ theg pa des su yang nges par 'byung ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa gang yin pa de dang / gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis
254b7(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs
254b8(khri brgyad): pa la/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / 
255a1(khri brgyad): sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
255a2(khri brgyad): phyir/ de bzhin nyid mi dmigs yang dag pa'i mtha'i mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 
255a3(khri brgyad): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ de
255a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
255a5(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
255a6(khri brgyad): phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
255a7(khri brgyad): phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par
255a8(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de
255b1(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / 
255b2(khri brgyad): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
255b3(khri brgyad): nyid mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye ba med pa mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
255b4(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa mi dmigs/ shin tu rnam pa dar dag pa'i phyir/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ de bzhin
255b5(khri brgyad): du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 
255b6(khri brgyad): gnas pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mi dmigs/ de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gang dmigs su med
255b7(khri brgyad): pas thams cad mi dmigs zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas/ chos kyi dbyings
255b8(khri brgyad): mi dmigs so// skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su
256a1(khri brgyad): med pas/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pas/ de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so// 
256a2(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
256a3(khri brgyad): so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
256a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dmi gas su med pas/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 
256a5(khri brgyad): / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su me dpas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigaso// du panapa dis ma bye ga dras #
256a6(khri brgyad): so/ de bzhin du yang dag pa spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dmigs su med pas/ lam mi dmigs so// 
256a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
256a8(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dmigs su med pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bco
256b1(khri brgyad): pa dmigs su med pas/ dgra bcom pa mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pas/ rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du dmigs
256b2(khri brgyad): su med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmig so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
256b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dmigs su med pas/ sangs rgyas nyid mi dmigs so// de bzhin du sa dmigs su med pas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa mi
256b4(khri brgyad): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sa dmig su med pas/ dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro can dang / shin
256b5(khri brgyad): tu sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin gyis mi dmigs so// gzhan yang
256b6(khri brgyad): sa dmigs su med pas sa bcu mi dmigs te/ bcu gang zhe na/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i
256b7(khri brgyad): sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa can gyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ nang stong pa nyid
256b8(khri brgyad): kyis dang po mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dang po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngon
257a1(khri brgyad): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis bcu'i bar du mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
257a2(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyis/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi dmigaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
257a3(khri brgyad): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mig lnga mi
257a4(khri brgyad): dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de da ltar spyod pa ni/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul
257a5(khri brgyad): gyis theg pa chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du// nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
257a6(khri brgyad): las theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
257a7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
257a8(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de ni na mkha' dang mnyam pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'
257b1(khri brgyad): ni sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ 
257b2(khri brgyad): grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po lags so// 
257b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ gnas pa mi dmigs/ sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi
257b4(khri brgyad): dmigs lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/ gnas pa mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das
257b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la yang 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs gnas pa mi dmigs lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyin/ dus gsum
257b6(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du na mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang
257b7(khri brgyad): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi
257b8(khri brgyad): theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ 
258a1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
258a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
258a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta
258a4(khri brgyad): ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzi dan gyi sgo thams cad de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam
258a5(khri brgyad): par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dgaste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
258a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag ste/ da ni byang chub sems dpa'
258a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / 
258a8(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 
258b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de ni byang chub
258b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyi 'di skad du theg pa chen po de ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
258b3(khri brgyad): mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / 
258b4(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i khams so// rab 'byor de la gal te/ 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na
258b5(khri brgyad): dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la dngos po med pa ma yin na ni// 
258b6(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams
258b7(khri brgyad): ni brtag pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste// de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / ther gzugs ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po
258b8(khri brgyad): yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te
259a1(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / 
259a2(khri brgyad): ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha
259a3(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ gzugs kyi khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrub pa tshig gi
259a4(khri brgyad): bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug/ ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
259a5(khri brgyad): chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te gzugs med pa'i kham
259a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa
259a7(khri brgyad): dang / ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ thag pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas
259a8(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs med pa'i khams ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi
259b1(khri brgyad): brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
259b2(khri brgyad): rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na
259b3(khri brgyad): nyid dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la dngos po ma yin na ni/ theg pa
259b4(khri brgyad): chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcasad pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir
259b5(khri brgyad): gzugs ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa tshigagis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos
259b6(khri brgyad): can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung
259b7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / 
259b8(khri brgyad): phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ dngos
260a1(khri brgyad): po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par
260a2(khri brgyad): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / 
260a3(khri brgyad): ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
260a4(khri brgyad): zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ gal te mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
260a5(khri brgyad): dang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
260a6(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa lnga
260a7(khri brgyad): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma
260a8(khri brgyad): log pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin dang / rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa ma
260b1(khri brgyad): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir
260b2(khri brgyad): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis brtan pa ste/ de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing / ther zug ma yin la/ 
260b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ 
260b4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang // 
260b5(khri brgyad): ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / 
260b6(khri brgyad): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi de bzhin du gyur te/ ma nor ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / yang dag pa dang / bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin
260b7(khri brgyad): dang rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang / mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/ de dngos po med pa yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
260b8(khri brgyad): zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir rga shi ni brtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa/ tshig gis bstan pa ste/ mi rtag/ mi brtan zhing / 
261a1(khri brgyad): ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
261a2(khri brgyad): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin nyid dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen
261a3(khri brgyad): po 'di lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ de bzhin nyid dngos po// 
261a4(khri brgyad): med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg/ pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bca sa pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par
261a5(khri brgyad): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi
261a6(khri brgyad): gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis
261a7(khri brgyad): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
261a8(khri brgyad): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbying
261b1(khri brgyad): dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung
261b2(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
261b3(khri brgyad): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
261b4(khri brgyad): theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te/ tshul
261b5(khri brgyad): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin padang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
261b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges
261b7(khri brgyad): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang
261b8(khri brgyad): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid dngos po yin te/ dngos po med
262a1(khri brgyad): pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba
262a2(khri brgyad): zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir nang stong pa nyid dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
262a3(khri brgyad): rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yod pa yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
262a4(khri brgyad): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas// nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor
262a5(khri brgyad): gang gi phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
262a6(khri brgyad): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dngos po yin te/ dngos po ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen
262a7(khri brgyad): po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ 
262a8(khri brgyad): dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab
262b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
262b2(khri brgyad): lag brgyad pa dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar
262b3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir lam dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
262b4(khri brgyad): gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byo// ra gal te tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
262b5(khri brgyad): 'jug pa rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
262b6(khri brgyad): mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dngos po med cing dngos po
262b7(khri brgyad): ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal
262b8(khri brgyad): te stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ 
263a1(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / l+h+wa ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig
263a2(khri brgyad): na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos/ lha dang / mi dang / lha
263a3(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
263a4(khri brgyad): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na// 
263a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha
263a6(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te brgyad pa'i chos rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni// 
263a7(khri brgyad): theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gis phyir brgyad pa'i
263a8(khri brgyad): chos rnams dngos po med cing dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar/ 
263b1(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / 
263b2(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / rab 'byor gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg
263b3(khri brgyad): pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ sangs rgyas
263b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin/ pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
263b5(khri brgyad): mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab 'byoragang gi phyir rigs kyis dngos po med cing // dngos po ma yin pas/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / 
263b6(khri brgyad): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ rigs kyis dngos po med cing / dngos po
263b7(khri brgyad): yod ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te
263b8(khri brgyad): brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rab 'byor gal te
264a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas
264a2(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ sangs rgyas dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin/ 
264a3(khri brgyad): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yin te/ dngos po
264a4(khri brgyad): med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ 
264a5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gang gi phyir lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du/ sa pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med cing / dngos po la/ dpa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen pos lha dang / 
264a6(khri brgyad): mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la
264a7(khri brgyad): thug gi bar du bar der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / 
264a8(khri brgyad): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub
264b1(khri brgyad): kyi snying po la thug gi bar du der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa
264b2(khri brgyad): chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
264b3(khri brgyad): chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ 
264b4(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med cing / dngos
264b5(khri brgyad): po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab
264b6(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems
264b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos bag chags dang / mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad
264b8(khri brgyad): kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob nas/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ byang
265a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
265a2(khri brgyad): chen pos/ bag chags dang / 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes/ rnam pa thams cad
265a3(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung ba 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te de
265a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ 
265a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis lha dang / mi dang / lha
265a6(khri brgyad): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
265a7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
265a8(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
265b1(khri brgyad): gyis mnan te/ mdzes shing / l+h+wam me/ ldan ne/ ltung ngo'o// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'dod ngos po yin
265b2(khri brgyad): te/ dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab par
265b3(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dngos po med cing / dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshes
265b4(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ste/ de dag snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te
265b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa dngos po yod cing / dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/ de bzhin
265b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu go bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab
265b7(khri brgyad): 'byor gang gi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa dngos po med cing / dngos po ma yin pas/ de'i
265b8(khri brgyad): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu go bar 'gyur ro// rab
266a1(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/ dngos po med pa ma
266a2(khri brgyad): yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ lus kyang 'jig
