292a1(khri brgyad): pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas
292a2(khri brgyad): stong ngo // nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo // rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa ni de
292a3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong pa la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du she
292a4(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med
292a5(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa/ 
292a6(khri brgyad): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams
292a7(khri brgyad): cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams
292a8(khri brgyad): par bgyi zhing / rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs su med do// gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do// tshor ba ni
292b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba la dmigs su med do// tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do// gzugs dang tshor bdag ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do// 'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do// 
292b2(khri brgyad): 'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do// 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed la med cing mi dmigaso// 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigaso// 'du
292b3(khri brgyad): shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmig so// 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmig so// 'du byed
292b4(khri brgyad): rnams ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigaso// rnam par/ shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigaso// 
292b5(khri brgyad): gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
292b6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmig so// mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigaso// rna ba ni mig la med cing mi
292b7(khri brgyad): dmig so// rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmig so// rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigaso// sna ni sna la med cing mi dmig so// sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmig so// sna ni lce la med cing
292b8(khri brgyad): mi dmigaso// lce ni lce la med cing mi dmigaso// lce ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so// lce ni lus la med cing mi dmig so// lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs
293a1(khri brgyad): so// lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce rnams la med cing mi dmig so// lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so// yid ni yid la med cing mi dmig so// yid
293a2(khri brgyad): ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmig so// gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams
293a3(khri brgyad): la med cing mi dmigs so// sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmig so// sgra ni gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmig so// de bzhin du dri ni dri dang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmig so// re ni ro dang gzhan
293a4(khri brgyad): dag la yang med cing mi dmigaso// reg bya ni reg bya dang ga zhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so// chos ni chos rnams dang gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmig so// mig gi
293a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigaso// gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmig/ sa so// de dag la yang de med cing mi dmigaso// rna ba'i rnam
293a6(khri brgyad): par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par
293a7(khri brgyad): shes pa la med cing mi dmig so// gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmig so// de yang gzhan la med cing mi dmig so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigaso
293a8(khri brgyad): de ni gzhan dag la yang med cing mi dmigs so// de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi
293b1(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang de bzhin te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigaso// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang reg pa gzhan dag
293b2(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmig so// de la yang gzhan dag dang gzhan la yang
293b3(khri brgyad): gzhan dag med cing mi dmig so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing
293b4(khri brgyad): mi dmigaso// de la yang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la yang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigaso// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la med cing mi
293b5(khri brgyad): dmigs so// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang // stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 
293b6(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag ni/ 
293b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi
293b8(khri brgyad): chos rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so// chos tham cad ni chos
294a1(khri brgyad): thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so// chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la
294a2(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi
294a3(khri brgyad): dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmig so// ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs
294a4(khri brgyad): rnams la med cing mi dmig so// gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigaso// gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so// so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i sa la
294a5(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmig so// rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas pa
294a6(khri brgyad): rtogs pa can gyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni/ rnam pa thams cad
294a7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa'i sa la med cing mi dmig so// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigaso// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / 
294a8(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigaso// byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing
294b1(khri brgyad): mi dmig so// byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi
294b2(khri brgyad): dmigaso// gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmig so// gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa ni gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi
294b3(khri brgyad): dmig so// byang chub sems dpa' ni gdams pa dang rje su bstan pa la mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmig so// byang chub sems dpa' yang
294b4(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi
294b5(khri brgyad): bde ni ming tsam du bas lags so// zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem sa dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 
294b6(khri brgyad): de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du
294b7(khri brgyad): yang mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du mi 'gro'o// 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes
294b8(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnamos zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no// ming gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes
295a1(khri brgyad): ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ stong pa gang yin pa de
295a2(khri brgyad): ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
295a3(khri brgyad): nga zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin/ 
295a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang me da cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// 
295a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
295a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni ming tsam ste/ ming la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do// de tsa
295a7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
295a8(khri brgyad): dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni ming tsam du zad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / 
295b1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang nang stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ 
295b2(khri brgyad): nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong
295b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ming gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des
295b4(khri brgyad): na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba de ni glo bur du
295b5(khri brgyad): ming du btags pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang ming mi dmigs la/ ming la yang dran pa nye/ bar gzhag pa rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
295b6(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / 
295b7(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
295b8(khri brgyad): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na
296a1(khri brgyad): yang ming med la/ ming yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas
296a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes bya ba dang / 
296a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang ming med la/ ming la yang rnam pa thams cad
296a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang
296a5(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i/ bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ bdag
296a6(khri brgyad): bdag ces bgyi yang / bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so// zhes smra zhes zer bapa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag gtan ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
296a7(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang
296a8(khri brgyad): byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan
296b1(khri brgyad): med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon/ 
296b2(khri brgyad): par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
296b3(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub
296b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang // ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la
296b5(khri brgyad): yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa ga tan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub para'agyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
296b6(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing
296b7(khri brgyad): mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na de
296b8(khri brgyad): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta
297a1(khri brgyad): gal yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyi 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ 
297a2(khri brgyad): de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 
297a3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297a4(khri brgyad): gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
297a5(khri brgyad): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dam gas na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 
297a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi// 
297a7(khri brgyad): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
297a8(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
297b1(khri brgyad): ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ 
297b2(khri brgyad): de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med
297b3(khri brgyad): cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na
297b4(khri brgyad): de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang / da ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bdag pa dag ces bya ba yang bdag mngon par 'grub pa ni gtan
297b5(khri brgyad): med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yangakhyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos tham sa cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes
297b6(khri brgyad): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu smras pa/ 
297b7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba dang / 
297b8(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// 
298a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzug
298a2(khri brgyad): dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig
298a3(khri brgyad): gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / 
298a4(khri brgyad): lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung / 
298a5(khri brgyad): ba'i ngo bo nyid medado// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
298a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yino// 
298a7(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// shA ri'i bu smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad mi rtag pa ste gang
298a8(khri brgyad): dang yang bral bas ma yin pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba
298b1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa
298b2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang
298b3(khri brgyad): dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams
298b4(khri brgyad): cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas
298b5(khri brgyad): pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang
298b6(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste gang dang yang brel bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma
298b7(khri brgyad): yin 'jig pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
298b8(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du
299a1(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther drug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de min pa/ 
299a2(khri brgyad): phyir ro// de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang
299a3(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin ma byas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba
299a4(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das/ pa'i bar ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i
299a5(khri brgyad): phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir
299a6(khri brgyad): gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang
299a7(khri brgyad): lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par
299a8(khri brgyad): grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mngon par
299b1(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// 
299b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas
299b3(khri brgyad): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni
299b4(khri brgyad): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad kyi bar du yang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// 
299b5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po midamigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 
299b6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon par
299b7(khri brgyad): ma grub pa de gzugs mo lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ 
299b8(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis steng ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig
300a1(khri brgyad): pa med do// skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
300a2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// 
300a3(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du
300a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// gang ma ngon par ma grub pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
300a5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma mi na no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa de/ 
300a6(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing / rjes su bstan pa bgyi lags sam zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon
300a7(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes
300a8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ kho bos 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa de
300b1(khri brgyad): mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smraso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di/ 
300b2(khri brgyad): skad du/ ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lag so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ 
300b3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems
300b4(khri brgyad): yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub se mas dpa' zhes bya ba de dag ni gnyis su med cing
300b5(khri brgyad): gnyis su dbyer med do// mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na/ tshor ba dang / 'du
300b6(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par mi grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
300b7(khri brgyad): su dbyer med do// de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyisu dbyer med do// 
300b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni
301a1(khri brgyad): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod
301a2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad steng pa// bam po bcu bdun pa
301a3(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi
301a4(khri brgyad): 'gyur la/ mi sgeg mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par
301a5(khri brgyad): bgyi'o zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par
301a6(khri brgyad): rjes su mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / 
301a7(khri brgyad): sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni
301a8(khri brgyad): bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ 
301b1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas pa/ 
301b2(khri brgyad): mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
301b3(khri brgyad): shes pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags// de bzhin du de'i tshe// 
301b4(khri brgyad): mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhe sa 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe// 
301b5(khri brgyad): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni yod do zhes 'dogs
301b6(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid lag so// de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
301b7(khri brgyad): zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
301b8(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes/ 
302a1(khri brgyad): 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di na
302a2(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi/ 
302a3(khri brgyad): bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
302a4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
302a5(khri brgyad): rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag par sngo/ nga ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / 
302a6(khri brgyad): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
302a7(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
302a8(khri brgyad): gyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ ting nge 'dzi
302b1(khri brgyad): gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
302b2(khri brgyad): kyi sgo rnams so// zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
302b3(khri brgyad): la spyod pa ni/ gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
302b4(khri brgyad): sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol tu/ phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa
302b5(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mtho nga ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba
302b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i/ 
302b7(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
302b8(khri brgyad): shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lag so// mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lagaso// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
303a1(khri brgyad): yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma
303a2(khri brgyad): lags so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
303a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis
303a4(khri brgyad): su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so//  nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma lags so// dngos po med pa'i
303a5(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
303a6(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni
303a7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// 
303a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yin lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes/ 
303b1(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas
303b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
303b3(khri brgyad): ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa
303b4(khri brgyad): ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang // skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis
303b5(khri brgyad): su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de'i slad du de
303b6(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 
303b7(khri brgyad): chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
303b8(khri brgyad): ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// 
304a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
304a2(khri brgyad): ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
304a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su/ 
304a4(khri brgyad): ma mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag da pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzug
304a5(khri brgyad): ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dubyed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te de ltar
304a6(khri brgyad): na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ 
304a7(khri brgyad): mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / 
304a8(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa ni gnyis sum mchos shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags bden
304b1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de bzhin
304b2(khri brgyad): du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
304b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis
304b4(khri brgyad): shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa lag so// da ci'i sla/ da du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa da ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 
304b5(khri brgyad): de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib
304b6(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i
304b7(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa
304b8(khri brgyad): nyid ma lag so// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos
305a1(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
305a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa da ni/ dngos po
305a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar
305a4(khri brgyad): gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyisu ma mchis shi/ rang gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
305a5(khri brgyad): lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lag so// 
305a6(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa'i
305a7(khri brgyad): 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ lam ma lags te/ da ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
305a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lagaso// de bzhin du mngon par shes
305b1(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ 
305b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad du
305b3(khri brgyad): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni
305b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyi sum mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lag so// de bzhin
305b5(khri brgyad): du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam sa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lag so// gang yang
305b6(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med
305b7(khri brgyad): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab
305b8(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni
306a1(khri brgyad): gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 
306a2(khri brgyad): gang khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes
306a3(khri brgyad): bya'o// byang chub de kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa yang med do// chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes zhe na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang
306a4(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du
306a5(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen pa
306a6(khri brgyad): med do// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la yang mngon par zhen
306a7(khri brgyad): pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang
306a8(khri brgyad): ngag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas
306b1(khri brgyad): chos rnams sam/ gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/ den/ 
306b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha
306b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / 
306b4(khri brgyad): skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / da lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug
306b5(khri brgyad): las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
306b6(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
306b7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnam
306b8(khri brgyad): dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// 
307a1(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcobargyad po dag las la du song / 
307a2(khri brgyad): de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes
307a3(khri brgyad): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa/ 
307a4(khri brgyad): pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi
307a5(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs bde zhes bya ba/ dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nyeb
307a6(khri brgyad): mi rtog/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / 
307a7(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de
307a8(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes partag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal / 
307b1(khri brgyad): bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam
307b2(khri brgyad): par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa
307b3(khri brgyad): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
307b4(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307b5(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sgyu ra te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang // 
307b6(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshon ma yod
307b7(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du nang stong pa
307b8(khri brgyad): nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi rtog go/ 
308a1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi
308a2(khri brgyad): rtog go// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/ 
308a3(khri brgyad): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lags rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
308a4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre das pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
308a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtogabade zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / 
308a6(khri brgyad): ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan mo yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben
308a7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye
308a8(khri brgyad): bar rtog par byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// 
308b1(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lagaso// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel/ 
308b2(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
308b3(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa
308b4(khri brgyad): gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma la gso zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan rapa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshe dang
308b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa
308b6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
308b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes
308b8(khri brgyad): pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
309a1(khri brgyad): ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
309a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de/ 
309a3(khri brgyad): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
309a4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// 
309a5(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po ma pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
309a6(khri brgyad): ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med
309a7(khri brgyad): ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid
309a8(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / 
309b1(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
309b2(khri brgyad): chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
309b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin// 
309b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyi'adi ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs ma lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
309b5(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang rten cing 'brel
309b6(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
309b7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lagaso zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras/ 
309b8(khri brgyad): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
310a1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang
310a2(khri brgyad): ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// khams dang skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
310a3(khri brgyad): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / 
310a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
310a5(khri brgyad): yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa'i chos de dag tham sa cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 
310a6(khri brgyad): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yino// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
310a7(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yino// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa
310a8(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yino// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su mchis pa'i grangasu bgyis pa lags
310b1(khri brgyad): so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lag so// gang yang rnam pa thams
310b2(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de yang / gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lag so// zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba med pa yang
310b3(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so// gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med do// skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
310b4(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
310b5(khri brgyad): bu rnam grangs des na gang yang gzugs shes bya ba de ni ga nyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no// gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
310b6(khri brgyad): par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yino// khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi
310b7(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhi
310b8(khri brgyad): no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// rnam
311a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis
311a2(khri brgyad): su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
311a3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// 
311a4(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 8'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma ma chis pa mthong lagaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad
311a5(khri brgyad): du bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// shin turnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can dang / srogadang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed
311a6(khri brgyad): las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 
311a7(khri brgyad): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa
311a8(khri brgyad): mthong lagaso// de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam/ 
311b1(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis par mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags
311b2(khri brgyad): so/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
311b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
311b4(khri brgyad): yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig/ das pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
311b5(khri brgyad): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// shin tu rnam paradag pa'i slad du/ so so skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong
311b6(khri brgyad): lag so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i chos kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams
311b7(khri brgyad): dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / 
311b8(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lagaso// sangs
312a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lag so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ 
312a2(khri brgyad): gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang skye ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba med pa yin no// skye mched rnams
312a3(khri brgyad): skye ba med pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
312a4(khri brgyad): cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzung das kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
312a5(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa dzin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin// so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye ba'i
312a6(khri brgyad): chos kyang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / 
312a7(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chu
312a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la/ songs
312b1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ nyan thos kyis kyang nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang ra
312b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ram/ 'gro ba rnam pa lnga yang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// byang
312b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub rnam pa lnga yang thob zin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs/ 
312b4(khri brgyad): pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/  lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ 
312b5(khri brgyad): phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang / 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga/ spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang / 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang / 
312b6(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis ni/ rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
312b7(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing / sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
312b8(khri brgyad): kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
313a1(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa las 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do// kho bo ni ma skyes pa las rgyun tu zhugs
313a2(khri brgyad): nga nyid yod par mi 'dod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong
313a3(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo
313a4(khri brgyad): ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
313a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas/ pas ni/ sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan
313a6(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu/ 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa na/ sems can dpag tu med grang med pa rnam
313a7(khri brgyad): don byed par nuso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad kyi
313a8(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la yang / de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed
313b1(khri brgyad): par gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams
313b2(khri brgyad): cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do// bla na med pa yang
313b3(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do// chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob par bya ba ma skyes pa thob par mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
313b4(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor tsam skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes da pa 'thob pa 'am/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
313b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma yin pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do// 
313b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci 'thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa yang yod/ 
313b7(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi gdags pa'o// 
313b8(khri brgyad): rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis
314a1(khri brgyad): gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs pa yang med/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang med/ phyir mi
314a2(khri brgyad): 'ong ba yang med/ dgra bcom pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'thob pa dang
314a3(khri brgyad): mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/ skye ba med pa'
314a4(khri brgyad): da ltar yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye ba yang mi skye la/ skye ba med pa yang mi skye'o// 
314a5(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so// chos ma skyes so// zhes bya bar brjod pa spobs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba
314a6(khri brgyad): med pa yang brjod par spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma
314a7(khri brgyad): skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do// chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa brjod pa'i spobs pa yang kho bo la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
314a8(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad
314b1(khri brgyad): ni ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir// 
314b2(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa yang skye ba med/ spobs pa yang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang dag la brtsams te/ brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag
314b3(khri brgyad): kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o// spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o// chos ni skye ba med pa'o// gang
314b4(khri brgyad): dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye da pa med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba medapa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
314b5(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub
314b6(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so
314b7(khri brgyad): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus
314b8(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do// spobs pa skye ba med do// chos skye ba med do// gang dag las brtsams te/ brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag
315a1(khri brgyad): kyang skye ba med do// phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
315a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
315a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do// de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro
315a4(khri brgyad): ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon
315a5(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad gyis tha dad hUM/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
315a6(khri brgyad): ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/ skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus
315a7(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi
315a8(khri brgyad): 'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye ba yang mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho
315b1(khri brgyad): bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// de bzhin du khams rnams
315b2(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi
315b3(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skye ba thob par mi 'dod do// mngon par rtogs pa mi 'dod do// shA
315b4(khri brgyad): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skye/ ngas pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/  dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis
315b5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du/ kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam sa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod
315b6(khri brgyad): do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye
315b7(khri brgyad): 'am/ skyes pa'i chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ma skyes pa'ang mi skye la/ skyes pa'ang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skyes pa gang yin pa dang / 
315b8(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med
316a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 
316a2(khri brgyad): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
316a3(khri brgyad): kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
316a4(khri brgyad): lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang da/ yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang
316a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ brjod pa skye ba med/ spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skye ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye
316a6(khri brgyad): ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu gzhag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang
316a7(khri brgyad): yongs su dris pa de dang / de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan// 
316a8(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de'i nang na yang mi gnas/ 
316b1(khri brgyad): rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis
316b2(khri brgyad): stong ste/ de ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na yang
316b3(khri brgyad): mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ gnyi ga med par yang mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
